mapper.sql: select id, uid, record_id, join_uid, start_time, expired_time, status, create_time, update_time, tenant_id, activity_id from t_join_share_money_activity_history
mapper.select: select jsah.uid, tui.name as user_name from t_join_share_money_activity_history as jsah left join t_user_info as tui on tui.uid = jsah.uid where tui.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and jsah.join_uid = #{joinUid} order by jsah.create_time desc limit 1
